name: Bread Judge
description:
Bread judge (逆転裁パン) is a visual novel adventure game developed by Toki and Platinum themed on "cliché" which is released in Game Off 2022.

You will play as the greatest baker & the presiding judge of the God of Bread to make judgement of those bad bread! In total of 4 cases, each of which requires you to collect key items in the memory and question the bad bread using these evidence. Guilty or not guilty? Their future is in your hand.

Code & Script: Toki

Art: Platinum
